Name: Bullet Wave
About the game: Bullet Wave is a driving first-person shooter straight out of the 90s. Go to the space station to fight against hordes of zombies, combat drones and infernal evil spirits. Explore the levels, use an extensive arsenal of weapons to arrange a real retro action. Show your speed and accuracy of shooting, clear the space station of monsters and solve the mystery of the red planet. Main Features Visual style and soundtrack inspired by the FPS of the 90s Various space station interiors Fast action and a large arsenal of guns Hordes of enemies that will make you sweat
Meta Title: Bullet Wave: Sep 23, 2021, Boom Games and Full Overview
